title: Business Strategy Practical Competency Strengthening: Real-Life English Project-Based Learning Using Smartphones

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and fundamental smartphone operation proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Using smartphone-based translation/speech recognition tools, learners can produce travel-related English expressions for situational contexts with 80% accuracy.
With mobile collaboration tools (e.g., Google Docs), learners can co-create English project deliverables with peers.
Using digital flashcard apps (e.g., Anki), learners can acquire and reproduce ten or more job-related English vocabulary items daily.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
